Download a copy <a href="LewisJonesCV.pdf" target="_blank">here</a>.

```{r, include=FALSE}
text <- readLines("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LewisAJones/cv-markdown/refs/heads/main/README.md")
text <- text[1:length(text)]
write(x = text, file = "_content.md")
download.file(url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LewisAJones/cv-markdown/main/cv.pdf",
              destfile = "LewisJonesCV.pdf")
```
